requirements.summary: Roll back the live production deployment to the previously deployed Version 5 build without changing the draft/codebase, and verify core pages load signed-out.
acceptanceCriteria: The public production URL serves the Version 5 build (not Version 6).
No code changes are introduced as part of the rollback; only the production deployment target changes.
After rollback, core pages (Home, Daily Verse, Stories, Testament pages) load successfully in an anonymous/signed-out session.

file_operations.description: Operational-only: follow the existing documented deployment/production procedures in this file to perform the production rollback to Version 5. Do not commit any edits to this file or any other source/assets as part of the rollback request; use it strictly as the runbook and perform post-rollback signed-out smoke checks for Home, Daily Verse, Stories, and Testament pages against the public production URL.
